statements: SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase;
SELECT title, author FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE publication_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, title, author FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE abstract IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE publication_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, title, abstract FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE abstract IS NOT NULL AND author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date, findings FROM literature_reviews WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title FROM literature_reviews WHERE publication_date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT author, publication_date FROM publications WHERE citation_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, author FROM literature_reviews WHERE title LIKE '%research%';
SELECT * FROM literature_reviews WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM literature_reviews ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, count(*) AS total_publications FROM publications GROUP BY author HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT title, author, YEAR(publication_date) AS publication_year FROM publications WHERE citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_year ASC;
SELECT title, author, findings FROM literature_reviews WHERE title LIKE '%research%' AND author <> 'Jane Smith';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM literature_reviews;
SELECT * FROM new_research_findings WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, title FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM new_research_findings WHERE researcher LIKE 'John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM literature_reviews;

SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT author, title FROM literature_reviews WHERE publication_date < '2019-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM new_research_findings WHERE topic LIKE '%machine learning%' ORDER BY published_date ASC;
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE author='Jane Smith' OR author='Bob Johnson';
SELECT title, author FROM LiteratureReview;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM Publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT research_summary, category FROM ResearchFindings WHERE status='published';
SELECT publication_title, authors, keywords FROM Publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReview WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReview WHERE title='Introduction to SQL'
SELECT * FROM ResearchFindings WHERE status='Published' AND category='Technology'
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReview ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT publication_title, authors, publication_date FROM Publications WHERE keywords LIKE '%database%'
SELECT u.update_id, u.update_date, p.publication_title FROM Updates u JOIN Publications p ON u.publication_id = p.publication_id
SELECT * FROM literature_review;
SELECT title, author FROM literature_review ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, authors FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_interests LIKE '%data science%';
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;

SELECT id, title FROM literature_review WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher, findings FROM research_findings WHERE date_analyzed < '2022-06-30';
SELECT publication_title, authors FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_interests LIKE '%Machine Learning%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
